body:
Sorry for the spurious issue, looks like you're quite correct!

I'd assumed that gradients weren't the cause as it wasn't reporting the gradients when we were querying for all Variables / tensors in the [object tree search](https://github.com/Smerity/examples/blob/wlm_memory_bug/word_language_model/memtree.py) and mistakenly assumed `zero_grad` threw the tensors back to the cached memory allocator for use in the next ground.

Thanks for catching what I missed and being so very attentive and rapid in response, @SsnL =]
